newsitem.title: USA: Grubb & Ellis expands via affiliations.
newsitem.headline: Grubb & Ellis expands via affiliations.

text.p: Grubb & Ellis Co said Thursday it formed an affiliation relationship with four independent real estate brokerage firms in markets where it previously did not have a presence.

The firms are in Milwaukee; Melville, N.Y.; Reno, Nev.; and Salt Lake City, Grubb & Ellis said. The affiliates will incorporate the Grubb & Ellis logo into their company names as part of the affiliation agreements.
Grubb & Ellis plans to affiliate with 25 local brokerage firms by the end of 1997 and with 50 more by the end of 1998.
Grubb & Ellis is a commercial real estate company.
Its shares were trading off 1/8 Thursday at 7-3/4.
